snippet: LEAD: The earthquake that jolted Southern California early Saturday was centered at the intersection of two faults, one of which caused a deadly aftershock more than a year ago, a seismologist said today....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The earthquake that jolted Southern California early Saturday was centered at the intersection of two faults, one of which caused a deadly aftershock more than a year ago, a seismologist said today.

headline.main: Quake Was Centered At Faults' Intersection
